lines.gurmukhi: dohrw ]

lines.gurmukhi: AiDk pRIq qw sO krI; icq mY cqur pCwn ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The wise lady extremely adored the Raja and disregarded all the norms of morality.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਸ ਨੂੰ) ਮਨ ਵਿਚ ਚਤੁਰ ਸਮਝ ਕੇ ਉਸ ਨਾਲ ਬਹੁਤ ਪ੍ਰੀਤ ਕੀਤੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: Cwif deI ljw sBY bDI ibrh ky bwn ]7]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She felt tormented with the arrows coming out of the bow of his love.(7)

lines.gurmukhi: qotk CMd ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Totak Chhand

lines.gurmukhi: liK rUp llw jU ko rIJ rhI ]

lines.gurmukhi: ijh joq pRBw nih jwq khI ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She was so much delighted with the sight of her loved one that it could not be narrated.

lines.gurmukhi: ins eyk iqRXw iqh bol ilXo ]

lines.gurmukhi: mn Bwvq BUp sO Bog ikXo ]8]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: One night she invited the Raja and, desirously, made love with him.(8)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਉਸ ਨਾਲ ਮਨ ਭਾਉਾਂਦੀ ਕਾਮ-ਕ੍ਰੀੜਾ ਕੀਤੀ ॥੮॥

lines.gurmukhi: isgrI ins BUp sO Bog kirXo ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: While she was keeping herself absorbed in sensual acts, the woman’s

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸਾਰੀ ਰਾਤ ਰਾਜੇ ਨਾਲ ਕਾਮ-ਕ੍ਰੀੜਾ ਕੀਤੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: ieh bIc iqRXw piq Awn pirXo ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Husband seemed to be coming.

lines.gurmukhi: iqh Awvq jwin frI ihX mY ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Seeing him proceeding (towards her) she was frightened and she

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਆਉਾਂਦੇ ਜਾਣ ਕੇ ਹਿਰਦੇ ਵਿਚ ਡਰ ਗਈ।

lines.gurmukhi: ieh Bwiq cirqR TitXo ijX mY ]9]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Planned to dupe him this way.(9)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਸ ਨੇ) ਮਨ ਵਿਚ ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਦਾ ਚਰਿਤ੍ਰ ਸੋਚਿਆ ॥੯॥

lines.gurmukhi: dohrw ]

lines.gurmukhi: qikXw kir rwKÎo inRpih AwpxI syj bxwie ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She covered and made the Raja to lie in the bed as a pillow and led

lines.gurmukhi: jwie ipXih Awgy ilXo; prm pRIiq aupjwie ]10]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Her husband there.(10)

lines.gurmukhi: BUp lKÎo icq mY PsÎo Awin iqRXw ky hyq ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The Raja thought in his mind that he had been entangled in the love,

lines.gurmukhi: AiDk icq BIqr firXo; sÍws n aUco lyq ]11]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: But he was petrified and could not breath aloud even.(11)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਹ ਮਨ ਵਿਚ ਬਹੁਤ ਡਰ ਗਿਆ ਅਤੇ ਉੱਚਾ ਸਾਹ ਤਕ ਨਾ ਲਿਆ ॥੧੧॥

lines.gurmukhi: piq sO Aiq riq mwin kY; rhI gry lptwie ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Clinging to her husband, she kept on making love.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਹ ਇਸਤਰੀ) ਪਤੀ ਨਾਲ ਕਾਮ ਕ੍ਰੀੜਾ ਕਰ ਕੇ ਗਲੇ ਨਾਲ ਲਿਪਟੀ ਰਹੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: ikXo isrwno BUp ko; soie rhy suK pwie ]12]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Using Raja as their pillow they went into peaceful slumber.(12)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਰਾਜੇ ਨੂੰ ਸਿਰ੍ਰਹਾਣਾ ਬਣਾ ਕੇ ਉਹ ਮੌਜ ਨਾਲ ਸੁਤੇ ਰਹੇ ॥੧੨॥

lines.gurmukhi: Bor Bey auiT ipX gXo; inRp so Bog kmwie ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: In the morning when the husband had gone she enabled the Raja out

lines.gurmukhi: kwiF isrwnw qy qurq; sdn idXo phucwie ]13]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Of the pillow, and after carnal affair let him go home.(13)

lines.gurmukhi: jy jy sÎwny hÍY jgq mY iqRX so krq pîwr ]

lines.gurmukhi: qwih mhw jV smuiJXY; icq BIqr inrDwr ]14]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The wise ones who love women, they should be considered absurd.(14)(1)

lines.gurmukhi: dohrw ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Dohira

lines.gurmukhi: BUp bMd igRh inju suqih; gih kir idXo pTwie ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The Monarch caught hold of his son and sent him to the prison, And

lines.gurmukhi: pRwq smY mMqRI sihq; bhuro ilXo bulwie ]1]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: In the morning, through the Minister, called him back.(1)

lines.gurmukhi: rIJ rwie AYsy khÎo bcn mMiqRXn sMg ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Then he asked the Minster to narrate the Chritars

lines.gurmukhi: purK iqRXn cqurn cirq; mo so krhu pRsMg ]2]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Of the wise men and the women -2

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਕਿ ਚਤੁਰ ਇਸਤਰੀਆਂ ਅਤੇ ਪੁਰਸ਼ਾ ਦੇ ਚਰਿਤ੍ਰ-ਪ੍ਰਸੰਗ ਮੈਨੂੰ ਸੁਣਾਓ ॥੨॥

lines.gurmukhi: qIr squdRv ky huqo; pur Anµd iek gwau ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: On the banks of the river Sutlaj, there was a village by the name of Anadpur.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸਤਲੁਜ ਨਦੀ ਦੇ ਕੰਢੇ ਆਨੰਦੁਪਰ ਨਾ ਦਾ ਇਕ ਪਿੰਡ ਸੀ

lines.gurmukhi: nyqR quMg ky iFg bsq; kwhlUr ky Twau ]3]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: It was situated near Naina Devi which situated was in the state of Kahloor.(3)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਨੈਣਾ ਦੇਵੀ ਪਰਬਤ ਦੇ ਨੇੜੇ ਕਹਿਲੂਰ ਖੇਤਰ (ਰਿਆਸਤ) ਵਿਚ ਸੀ ॥੩॥

lines.gurmukhi: qhw isK swKw bhuq; Awvq mod bFwie ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: There used to come several Sikhs with great pleasure,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਥੇ ਸਿੱਖ ਫ਼ਿਰਕੇ ('ਸਾਖਾ') ਦੇ ਬਹੁਤ ਲੋਕ ਪ੍ਰਸੰਨ ਚਿਤ ਨਾਲ ਆਉਾਂਦੇ ਸਨ

lines.gurmukhi: mn bwCq muiK mwg br; jwq igRhn suK pwie ]4]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: And after getting their ambitions fulfilled, they used to go back to their homes.(4)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਮਨ ਇਛਿਤ ਅਤੇ ਮੂੰਹ ਮੰਗੇ ਵਰ ਪ੍ਰਾਪਤ ਕਰ ਕੇ ਘਰਾ ਨੂੰ ਪਰਤਦੇ ਸਨ ॥੪॥

lines.gurmukhi: eyk iqRXw DnvMq kI; qOn ngr mY Awin ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The wife of a rich-man came to that town.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਇਕ ਧਨਵਾਨ ਦੀ ਇਸਤਰੀ ਉਸ ਨਗਰ ਵਿਚ ਆ ਕੇ

lines.gurmukhi: hyir rwie pIVq BeI; ibDI ibrh ky bwn ]5]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She fell for the Raja and was pierced with his love arrows.(5)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ (ਉਥੋਂ ਦੇ) ਰਾਜੇ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖ ਕੇ ਵਿਛੋੜੇ ਦੇ ਬਾਣ ਨਾਲ ਵਿੰਨ੍ਰਹੀ ਹੋਈ ਦੁਖੀ ਹੋ ਗਈ ॥੫॥

lines.gurmukhi: mgn dws qw ko huqo; so iqn ilXo bulwie ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She had a servant, Magan Das whom she called,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਮਗਨ ਨਾ ਦਾ ਇਕ (ਵਿਅਕਤੀ) ਉਸ (ਰਾਜੇ) ਦਾ ਦਾਸ ਸੀ। ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਉਸ ਨੇ ਬੁਲਾ ਲਿਆ।

lines.gurmukhi: kCuk drb qw ko idXo; AYsy kihXo bnwie ]6]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: And gave him some money and made him to understand like this.( 6)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਸ ਨੂੰ ਕੁਝ ਧਨ ਦੇ ਕੇ ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਸਮਝਾਇਆ ॥੬॥

lines.gurmukhi: ngr rwie qumro bsq; qwih imlwvhu moih ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: ‘You get me to meet the Raja,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਤੁਹਾਡੇ ਨਗਰ ਵਿਚ ਜੋ ਰਾਜਾ ਰਹਿੰਦਾ ਹੈ, ਮੈਨੂੰ ਉਸ ਨਾਲ ਮਿਲਾ ਦੇ।

lines.gurmukhi: qwih imly dYho quJY; Aimq drb lY qoih ]7]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: ‘And after encountering him 1 will give you lot of wealth.’(7)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਸ ਨਾਲ ਮੇਲ ਹੋ ਜਾਣ ਤੇ ਮੈਂ ਤੈਨੂੰ ਬਹੁਤ ਧਨ ਦਿਆਂਗੀ ॥੭॥

lines.gurmukhi: mgn loB Dn ky lgy; Awin rwv ky pws ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Becoming greedy for money, Magan came to the Raja,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਮਗਨ ਧਨ ਦੇ ਲਾਲਚ ਵਿਚ ਲਗ ਕੇ ਰਾਜੇ ਕੋਲ ਆ ਗਿਆ।

lines.gurmukhi: pir pwien kr joir kir; ieh ibiD ikX Ardwis ]8]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Fell on his feet and requested thus,(8)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਹੱਥ ਜੋੜ ਕੇ ਅਤੇ ਪੈਰੀਂ ਪੈ ਕੇ ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਬੇਨਤੀ ਕੀਤੀ ॥੮॥

lines.gurmukhi: isKÎo chq jo mMqR qum so AwXo mur hwQ ]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: ‘The incantation you wanted to learn, has come in my possession.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਆਪ ਜੋ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਸਿਖਣਾ ਚਾਹੁੰਦੇ ਸੀ, ਉਹ ਮੇਰੇ ਹੱਥ ਆ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ।

lines.gurmukhi: khY qumY so kIijXhu; ju kCu quhwry swQ ]9]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: ‘To learn the same you will have to proceed the way I ask.(9)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਮੈਂ ਤੁਹਾਨੂੰ ਕਰਨ ਲਈ ਕਹਾ, ਉਹੋ ਤੁਸੀਂ ਕਰੋ ॥੯॥
